section.para: The function performs loose routing as defined in RFC3261 and will set Avp value passed in Route header that were created by record_route.

section.title: strict_route() -- deprecated
section.para: If there are any Route HFs in the message, the function takes the first one, rewrites Request-URI with it's value and removes the first URI from Route HFs.
The function copies Avp for a new Record-Route header field. The header field will be inserted in the message before any other Record-Route header fields.
Meaning of the parameters is as follows:

listitem.para: string - Avp to be inserted into the Record-route in record_route.

example.title: rr_add_avp_cookie usage
example.programlisting: ... rr_add_avp_cookie("s:avp_identified_by_name"); rr_add_avp_cookie("i:10"); # identified by number rr_add_avp_cookie("avp_*"); # identified by regex ...

section.para: The function adds a new Record-Route header field. The header field will be inserted in the message before any other Record-Route header fields.
This function will put the string into Record-Route, don't use unless you know what you are doing.
Meaning of the parameters is as follows:

listitem.para: string - String to be inserted into the header field.
